website_summaries.verdict: A great-quality cheek palette that comes in a wide variety of colors.
pros: The Blush Trio is available in five different sets, each with three different colors
The shades are very pigmented and easy to blend
Some of the blushes offer a slight shimmer, while most are matte
The colors in each trio work well together or alone
cons: A little goes a long way, so it's easy to apply too much at first

customer_reviews.title: Great pigmented blushes!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, pigmented colors that blend together so well! Unfortunately, two of the colors have some shimmer, which isn’t appropriate for everyday wear, but still beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M. Evola

customer_reviews.title: I Love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with my purchase and would recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT !!
customer_reviews.text: I used this blush and absolutely loved it ! No regrets I highly recommend its very cute🥰 !
customer_reviews.author: Trinity

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful combination of colors
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and nice colors. First color can use as light contour as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Love the Pigment
customer_reviews.text: I adore this blush and a little bit goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Techau

customer_reviews.title: Ho we'll
customer_reviews.text: I buy for someone..she dint like so much colors..they are not same on that picture
customer_reviews.author: Jose Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Missing a whole color
customer_reviews.text: The palette was missing a color.....so my daughter only had 2 shades.
customer_reviews.author: Selena Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: I resive other product
customer_reviews.text: I order (pink pation) And resive (pool party) But it good product
customer_reviews.author: Anwar

customer_reviews.title: “Peachy Love” is much deeper, brighter, more orange-coral than the picture represents.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful palette. Anastasia makes gorgeous products, but if you’re looking for a peachy-pink blush palette, this is not it. I was surprised to find very deep corals and oranges.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Mc

customer_reviews.title: Great blush.
customer_reviews.text: Great blush set. I am blonde with blue eyes, and pale skin. This blush goes well with my skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: francine

product_meta.title: Anastasia Beverly Hills Blush Trios - Peachy Love
product_meta.description: Color:Peachy LoveAnastasia Beverly Hills Blush Trio is a collection of three full-pigment blush shades in ABH’s finely milled, blendable formula. Each shade provides buildable intensity and a seamless finish.
feature_bullets: A collection of three full-pigment blush shades in ABH’s finely milled, blendable formula
Compact features 3 shades for a variety of looks
Use the compact’s 3 shades separately or mix them together to create a variety of looks
The travel-friendly compact includes a large mirror for on-the-go touch-ups
